Package utils

package utils
The utils package contains utility classes that offer general-purpose functions and tools for the SC2002_CAMs application.
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
See Also:
  • CampComparators
  • DateUtil
  • InputUtil
  • PrintUtil
  • SortCampUtil
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CampComparators
    The CampComparators class provides static nested classes that implement the Comparator interface for comparing instances of the Camp class based on different criteria.
    CampComparators.ClosingComparator
    The ClosingComparator class is a comparator for sorting camps based on their registration closing dates.
    CampComparators.FacultyComparator
    The FacultyComparator class is a comparator for sorting camps based on the faculty they are open to.
    CampComparators.LocationComparator
    The LocationComparator class is a comparator for sorting camps based on their locations in lexicographical order.
    CampComparators.NameComparator
    The NameComparator class is a comparator for sorting camps based on their names in lexicographical order.
    CampComparators.StaffComparator
    The StaffComparator class is a comparator for sorting camps based on the staff member in charge.
    CampComparators.StartComparator
    The StartComparator class is a comparator for sorting camps based on their start dates.
    DateUtil
    The DateUtil class provides utility methods for working with dates.
    InputUtil
    The InputUtil class provides utility methods for handling user input.
    PrintUtil
    The PrintUtil class provides utility methods for printing headers and error messages.
    SortCampUtil
    The SortCampUtil class provides utility methods for sorting an ArrayList of Camp objects.
